subject: Re: [junit] Categories and JUnit
msgSnippet: Dale, it would be a first to actually incorporate such a large amount of third-party code, so we d play it a bit by ear.  It may be as simple as chiming in on
messageBody:
Dale,

it would be a first to actually incorporate such a large amount of
third-party code, so we'd play it a bit by ear. It may be as simple as
chiming in on the github pull request discussion with a statement similar
to yours above. If we get to that bridge, we'll make it as easy as
possible to cross.

David


On Mon, Jan 28, 2013 at 3:47 PM, Dale Emery <dale@...> wrote:

> Hi Marc,
>
> > All of these possibilities require that Johannes and/or Dale relicense
> their codebases under CPL for us, I guess. @Johannes, Dale: Would you do
> that?
>
>
> I would be happy to attach JUnit's usual license to any of my code
> incorporated into JUnit. At what time and by what means would I do that?
>
> Dale
